name: Devo
description:
Controls:

Hover over pc :  Gain money;

Hover over bed: Gain energy;

Music by @vesta

Update 1.01

Added a progress bar, here you can later select a project (game of you`re liking) youre working on, I`ve added a energy bar so when you`re using the computer you lose energy and when. The bed is used to regain energy. Also a clickable radio to put on music. You can also now press f1 to set the window to fullscreen.
